page.title: 18LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: The village of Shere has a wide range of leisure activities for all ages. There is an open air swimming pool just behind the church. The pool is reputed to be the oldest open air pool in the country. It was built in{1891 } and given to the village by{Harriet {Russell.}It is open daily during the summer season. On the recreation ground behind the village hall,there are facilities for football,tennis,cricket and bowls, each of these has its own club. The bowling club was founded in 1900 by the{Lord of the Manor,Sir Reginald {Bray,and the club badge bears the Bray {arms.}The land on which four rinks of the bowling green stand now belong to Shere Trust Properties, and the other two rinks are leased from the National Trust.
